contentrichtext.text: [[File:Map of Russia - Moscow Oblast (2008-03).svg|thumb|right|Location of Moscow Oblast in Russia]] [[File:Map of Russia - Voronezh Oblast (2008-03).svg|thumb|right|Location of Voronezh Oblast in Russia]] '''Kashirsky District''' is the name of several administrative and municipal districts in [[Russia]]: *[[Kashirsky District, Moscow Oblast]], an administrative<ref name="MoscowO_adm">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|mos|adm|law}}</ref> and municipal<ref name="MoscowOKashirskyD_mun">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|mos|mun|list|kashirsky}}</ref> district of [[Moscow Oblast]] *[[Kashirsky District, Voronezh Oblast]], an administrative and municipal district of [[Voronezh Oblast]]<ref name="VoronezhO_admmun">{{RussiaAdmMunRef|vor|adm|law}}</ref> ==See also== *[[Kashirsky (disambiguation)]] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{SIA|Russian districts}}
